meanings.definition: Devoid of physical sensation or the ability to feel.
meanings.sent1: After the accident, his arm felt completely numbest.
meanings.sent2: The cold winter air made her fingers numbest.
meanings.sent3: The numbest snowman in the yard couldn't even feel the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her heart grew numbest with each passing disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The numbest silence filled the room after the power outage.

meanings.sent1: The numbest response to the sad news was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: She felt numbest towards the situation, unable to cry.
meanings.sent3: The numbest teddy bear couldn't comfort the crying child.
meanings.sent4: His words fell on her numbest heart, unable to stir any emotion.
meanings.sent5: The numbest expression on his face revealed his inner turmoil.
